# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. EMBASSY INFORMED SUBSECRETARY FINANCE RAUL BOADA AND LUIS
VISCARRA, GENERAL MANAGER OF CENTRAL BANK OX BANK EXAMINERS
DESIRE TO EXAMINE FNCB AND BANK OF AMERICA BRANCHES IN LA PAZ.
BOADA, IN TURN, INFORMED MINFIN QUIROGA. ALL REACTED QUITE
POSITIVELY AND HAD NO OBJECTIONS.


2. EMBASSY RECOMMENDS THAT THE BANK EXAMINERS COME TO LA PAZ.


3. VISCARRA SAID HE WOULD APPRECIATE DISCUSSING BANK EXAMINERS
METHODS AND FINDINGS IF THEY WISH TO DO SO. CENTRAL BANK
IS CHARGED WITH AUDITING ALL BANKS IN BOLIVIA.
STEDMAN
